title: Historical trade of tortoiseshell reveals origins of modern wildlife trafficking networks

title_detail.value: Historical trade of tortoiseshell reveals origins of modern wildlife trafficking networks

summary: Historical tortoiseshell trade routes may have established the groundwork for modern illegal, unreported and unregulated (IUU) fishing, according to new research. The study also concludes that the tortoiseshell trade harvested nine million turtles, more than six times previous estimates.

summary_detail.value: Historical tortoiseshell trade routes may have established the groundwork for modern illegal, unreported and unregulated (IUU) fishing, according to new research. The study also concludes that the tortoiseshell trade harvested nine million turtles, more than six times previous estimates.
